Name: Bistrot Neuf

Review Text: I ordered through Uber eats. There was a problem with the order and they fixed it immediately. Excellent customer experience (unlike the support of Uber Eats). The food was absolutely delicious, probably the best that you can order at home! Merci beaucoup !

Name: Bistrot Neuf
Review Text:

Name: Bistrot Neuf
Review Text: For French cuisine with a twist, an extensive wine list and super friendly, fun and attentive service you cannot miss Neuf. We visit several times per week and feel part of the family because of the kind and cosy service. Definitely one of the best!

Name: Bistrot Neuf
Review Text: Great quality of food and wine. Dishes from menu are served in good portion sizes, and combination of flavors is amazing!

Name: Bistrot Neuf
Review Text: A very nice, high-end bistro, we had the 4 course dinner which was fantastic. What sets establishments like this apart in Amsterdam is the service, which was exquisite.

Name: Bistrot Neuf
Review Text: Popular restaurant serving French cuisine. The steak tartar and the lobster were very good and not too expensive. The wine list is reasonable value

Name: Bistrot Neuf
Review Text: My favorite French restaurant in Amsterdam. Their food and wine selection are top notch, and the cosy atmosphere is always a winner.

Name: Bistrot Neuf
Review Text: Great French restaurant in a cozy area in Amsterdam. This place has a great menu, I can highly recommend the Côte de Boeuf. However, it's the wine collection that is really the greatest attraction of this place. The wine list is long, …

Name: Bistrot Neuf
Review Text: Something has happened to this restaurant. Started out with great food and service. I have been over 5 times. However the last 2 times have been terrible. Service was arrogant and dismissive. Food was very average. Fix it or you will lose it. You are only as good as your worst night.

Name: Bistrot Neuf
Review Text: It's a nice and cosy place with limited but quite exciting menu. Ordered the coquilles saint jacques, which were very nice and the côte de boeuf prepared medium. But it was more on the rare almost raw side. Such a pity. Meat quality could be better too for that price... it was a bit tasteless.  Nice wine list although also pricey.

Name: Bistrot Neuf
Review Text: We got the escargot appetizer, and the coque au vin and fish entrees. Everything was superb!!! The ambiance is quiet, cosy, and private. And they have Michelin stars if you need any proof of the quality of meal you will receive. We definitely recommend to anyone in Amsterdam.

Name: Bistrot Neuf
Review Text: This is by far one of my favorite places to eat in Amsterdam. It's become a tradition for my wife and I to have our first meal here every time we visit. We start with the oysters, always fresh and refreshing. If we're here for lunch, one of …

Name: Bistrot Neuf
Review Text: Beef was chewy, waiter didn't know the menu, desert was very disappointing.

Name: Bistrot Neuf
Review Text: Delicious with nice service!!! Recommend it

Name: Bistrot Neuf
Review Text: Found several 2inches long pieces of raw meat in the tartare. We mentioned it to the waiter who changed it. It came back the same!! Not a word of apology. Name: Bistrot Neuf
Review Text: Excellent food! I was there a year ago and I still remember the mushrooms I had with the starter....delicious! Very generous portions and the staff were very professional. Lovely atmosphere and great memories, thank you.
